en: I'm a Data & AI lead with a passion for creating practical, AI-powered cloud-based products that blend low-code and pro-code approaches.

At PwC Portugal, I lead the design and implementation of Smart Products, Automation and AI integration, including Agentic AI, Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and Conversational AI/Chatbots. I am a certified Azure and Power Platform solution architect, holding 13 Microsoft certifications across multiple services. My technical background covers a wide range, including Microsoft Power Platform, Azure, Dynamics 365, Dataverse, Python, Databricks, C#/.NET, and more. I use these skills to develop scalable AI products and automate workflows that make work easier and more efficient.

Beyond my professional work, I love learning. I have a Master's in Economics and Management of Science, Technology, and Innovation, and a diverse set of interests—from philosophy and history to design, photography, and astronomy. I started a Portuguese-language podcast to share insights and dive into new areas of knowledge.
pt: Sou líder de Data & IA com paixão por criar produtos cloud práticos com IA que combinam abordagens low-code e pro-code.

Na PwC Portugal, lidero o design e implementação de Produtos Inteligentes, Automação e integração de IA, incluindo IA Agêntica, Geração Aumentada por Recuperação (RAG) e IA Conversacional/Chatbots. Sou arquiteto de soluções certificado em Azure e Power Platform, com 13 certificações Microsoft em vários serviços. Minha formação técnica abrange várias áreas, incluindo Microsoft Power Platform, Azure, Dynamics 365, Dataverse, Python, Databricks, C#/.NET, e mais. Uso essas competências para desenvolver produtos de IA escaláveis e automatizar fluxos de trabalho que tornam o trabalho mais fácil e eficiente.

Além do meu trabalho profissional, adoro aprender. Tenho um Mestrado em Economia e Gestão da Ciência, Tecnologia e Inovação, e um conjunto diversificado de interesses—desde filosofia e história até design, fotografia e astronomia. Iniciei um podcast em português para partilhar conhecimentos e explorar novas áreas de conhecimento.

en.title: Product and Cloud Lead - Data & AI team
en.description: Since January 2024, I have been at the helm of managing, designing, and implementing AI-focused, cloud-based solutions, including Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and integration of Large Language Models (LLMs), as a leader within PwC Portugal's Data & AI team. Our aim is to deliver top-tier AI-powered products, striking a balance between pro-code and low-code methodologies, and leveraging cloud-based deployment for scalability. I lead a team of experts, setting architectural standards and leading the orchestration of AI automation workflows. My proficiency in Microsoft Azure and Power Platform is crucial for advancing these solutions from concept to worldwide implementation.

pt.title: Responsável de Produto e Cloud - Equipa de Data & IA
pt.description: Desde janeiro de 2024, tenho estado à frente da gestão, design e implementação de soluções baseadas em cloud focadas em IA, incluindo Geração Aumentada por Recuperação (RAG) e integração de Grandes Modelos de Linguagem (LLMs), como líder dentro da equipa de Data & IA da PwC Portugal. O nosso objetivo é fornecer produtos de IA de alto nível, equilibrando metodologias pro-code e low-code, e aproveitando a implementação baseada em cloud para escalabilidade. Lidero uma equipa de especialistas, estabelecendo padrões arquitetónicos e liderando a orquestração de fluxos de trabalho de automação de IA. A minha proficiência em Microsoft Azure e Power Platform é crucial para avançar estas soluções do conceito à implementação mundial.

en.title: Cloud and Business Apps Lead - Consulting Solutions team
en.description: As the Cloud and Business Apps Consulting Lead, I design cutting-edge cloud architectures, having contributed to over 90 opportunities for global partners and clients. I manage a team of specialized technical consultants within a Consulting Solutions team of about 80 professionals.

pt.title: Responsável de Cloud e Apps de Negócio - Equipa de Soluções de Consultoria
pt.description: Como Responsável de Consultoria em Cloud e Apps de Negócio, desenho arquiteturas cloud de ponta, tendo contribuído para mais de 90 oportunidades para parceiros e clientes globais. Giro uma equipa de consultores técnicos especializados dentro de uma equipa de Soluções de Consultoria de cerca de 80 profissionais.

en.title: Specialist - Consulting Solutions team
en.description: As a Microsoft Power Platform specialist, I utilize the full suite of Power Platform tools, from Canvas Apps and Power BI reports to Power Portals/Pages and Chatbots (Virtual Agents/Copilot Studio). I integrated these solutions with Azure (e.g., Functions, Logic Apps, Data Factory & Data Lake Gen2), Microsoft 365 (e.g Teams, Outlook), Dynamics 365, SQL Server, Dataverse, and SharePoint services. In addition to this expertise, I've successfully led full-stack pro-code app development projects, overseeing them from concept to delivery. Notably, I also earned PwC Portugal's first ever Hackathon as the team leader and technical specialist. This initiative has evolved into a product that we are now beginning to sell worldwide.

pt.title: Especialista - Equipa de Soluções de Consultoria
pt.description: Como especialista em Microsoft Power Platform, utilizo o conjunto completo de ferramentas Power Platform, desde Canvas Apps e relatórios Power BI até Power Portals/Pages e Chatbots (Virtual Agents/Copilot Studio). Integrei estas soluções com Azure (por exemplo, Functions, Logic Apps, Data Factory & Data Lake Gen2), Microsoft 365 (por exemplo, Teams, Outlook), Dynamics 365, SQL Server, Dataverse e serviços SharePoint. Além desta experiência, liderei com sucesso projetos de desenvolvimento de aplicações pro-code full-stack, supervisionando-os desde o conceito até à entrega. Notavelmente, também ganhei o primeiro Hackathon da PwC Portugal como líder de equipa e especialista técnico. Esta iniciativa evoluiu para um produto que estamos agora a começar a vender mundialmente.

skillDescriptions.Low-code Development: Building powerful applications rapidly with visual interfaces and minimal traditional code, empowering business users to create solutions while maintaining enterprise-grade security, scalability and compliance.
skillDescriptions.Cloud Computing: Architecting and deploying flexible, scalable, and cost-effective solutions using distributed computing resources that adapt to changing business needs while ensuring enterprise-grade security and performance.
skillDescriptions.Microsoft Azure: Designing comprehensive cloud ecosystems leveraging Microsoft's industry-leading platform with deep expertise in AI/ML services, data analytics, security implementations, and hybrid architectures.
skillDescriptions.Microsoft Power Platform: Crafting complete business solutions by seamlessly integrating Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI, and Power Virtual Agents to solve complex enterprise challenges through a unified low-code approach.
skillDescriptions.Power BI: Creating sophisticated data visualizations and business intelligence solutions that transform complex datasets into clear, actionable insights driving informed decision-making at all organizational levels.
skillDescriptions.Power Automate: Designing intelligent workflow automation systems that eliminate repetitive tasks, connect disparate systems, and streamline business processes to boost efficiency and reduce operational costs.
skillDescriptions.Data Science: Combining statistical analysis, programming, and domain expertise to transform raw data into valuable business insights through predictive modeling, pattern recognition, and advanced analytical techniques.
skillDescriptions.Azure AI Services: Implementing cutting-edge AI capabilities into applications without extensive machine learning expertise, leveraging Microsoft's sophisticated vision, speech, language, and decision-making services.
skillDescriptions.Cloud Architecture: Designing robust, secure, and scalable cloud infrastructures that balance performance, reliability, compliance, and cost-optimization while leveraging cloud-native design principles.
skillDescriptions.Dynamics 365: Configuring and extending Microsoft's comprehensive suite of intelligent business applications to streamline operations, enhance customer engagement, and drive organizational transformation.
skillDescriptions.Databricks: Leveraging a unified analytics platform to process massive datasets and implement machine learning at scale, optimizing big data workflows for performance and insights.
skillDescriptions.RAG: Implementing advanced AI frameworks that enhance LLM outputs by retrieving and incorporating relevant knowledge from enterprise data sources, delivering more accurate, contextual, and trustworthy AI-generated content.
skillDescriptions.LLM Integration: Seamlessly incorporating powerful large language models into business applications to enable natural language understanding, content generation, and intelligent automation while ensuring responsible AI practices.
skillDescriptions.Python: Developing sophisticated data science solutions, automation tools, web applications, and AI systems using Python's versatile ecosystem of libraries and frameworks.
skillDescriptions.C#/.NET: Building enterprise-grade applications with Microsoft's powerful, type-safe programming language and framework, creating everything from cloud services to desktop applications.
skillDescriptions.Microsoft PowerPoint: Crafting compelling visual narratives that effectively communicate complex ideas, using advanced design techniques to create professional, impactful presentations.
skillDescriptions.Microsoft Excel: Performing sophisticated data analysis using advanced formulas, pivot tables, Power Query, and VBA to transform raw data into meaningful business insights.
skillDescriptions.Microsoft Word: Creating professionally formatted documents with consistent styling, automated workflows, and collaborative editing features for optimal content management.
skillDescriptions.Business Strategy: Formulating and executing comprehensive plans that align organizational capabilities with market opportunities to achieve sustainable competitive advantage and long-term growth.
skillDescriptions.Project Management: Orchestrating complex initiatives from conception to delivery, balancing scope, resources, timelines, and stakeholder needs to ensure successful outcomes while managing risks and quality standards.
skillDescriptions.Communication: Articulating complex ideas clearly across diverse audiences using tailored messaging strategies that drive understanding, build consensus, and inspire action.
skillDescriptions.Leadership: Inspiring and empowering teams to achieve exceptional results through clear vision-setting, effective delegation, continuous coaching, and creating environments where innovation thrives.
skillDescriptions.Product Management: Guiding the evolution of products from ideation through development and market launch, balancing customer needs, technical feasibility, and business objectives.
skillDescriptions.Business Development: Identifying and capitalizing on strategic opportunities to drive organizational growth through new partnerships, market expansion, and innovative business models.
skillDescriptions.Science Communication: Translating complex scientific concepts into accessible, engaging narratives that enhance public understanding and appreciation of scientific advancements.
skillDescriptions.History: Analyzing historical events, patterns, and developments to derive meaningful insights that inform present understanding and future decision-making.
skillDescriptions.SQL: Writing optimized queries and database structures to efficiently extract, manipulate, and analyze data from relational database systems.
skillDescriptions.Marketing: Developing strategic approaches to understand customer needs, create compelling value propositions, and build brand awareness that drives measurable business results.
skillDescriptions.Economics: Applying economic principles and analytical frameworks to understand market dynamics, optimize resource allocation, and inform policy decisions.
skillDescriptions.Politics: Analyzing systems of governance, power dynamics, and policy-making processes to understand how collective decisions shape organizational and societal outcomes.

en.podcast: 'Mesa do Canto' was a podcast in Portuguese where a friend and I convened to discuss a variety of subjects, including culture, politics, philosophy, history, economics, and technology.
en.dj: When I DJ, I like to play **Jazz**, **African Funk**, **Deep**, **Future**, **Disco** and **Progressive House**, along with other world music like *Habibi Funk*. All my sets are improvised, mixing both vinyl and digital formats.
en.photography: Photography is a hobby that helps me appreciate the world around us. I particularly enjoy capturing the ever-changing moods of the sky, from dramatic sunsets to the interplay of clouds and light.
en.playlistsIntro: Music has always been a significant part of my life. These playlists showcase some of my favorite genres, curated over time to create distinctive atmospheres.
